replies.body:
Honestly, this looks way more awesome than Dark Star Thresh.


http://i.imgur.com/tXx7N25.gif?nodirect
A xerath skin that isn't just a chroma? SIGN ME UP
implying guardian of the sands xerath isnt fucking GLORIUS. i bought it and i never even play xerath.

Guardians of the Sand Xerath feels too much like "Xerath if he never got locked up", and while what-if skins like that can be cool it just hasn't made me want to buy it in Xerath's case. 

None of Xerath's skins make me want to own or use them, which is quite sad considering how often I play him. There are skins I want for champions I don't play more than I want any of Xerath's skins...

Pretty much how I feel about Naut.  None of his skins call to me despite him being my second highest champ mastery and me having 2+ skins for every other champion I have at at least mastery 5.

Xerath skins also just feel kinda weak.  I mostly dislike Guardian of the Sands because my eyes don't register bright soft colours like yellow very well so it isn't much more than a smear across my screen shooting out other smears.

> a smear across my screen shooting out other smears.

Someone come up with a meme for this, quick.
I bought battlecast and actually wasted a refund on it, that's how bad it was. I should have looked up youtube videos of it first.

That's quite a bit better than my Program Xerath. Well Made!
